data.label:
LineNo: 9985159,

Narrator: My motorcade traveled for over an h...
en


My motorcade traveled for over an hour before the Archsanctuary of Plavo appeared just over the horizon.

LineNo: 9985261,

Narrator: It was a view I’d seen countless ti...
en


It was a view I’d seen countless times, but it never failed to inspire awe.

LineNo: 9985363,

Narrator: It was a view that inspired awe in...
en


It was a view that inspired awe in many a Rizian, especially the most devout followers of St. Wruhec.

LineNo: 9985465,

Narrator: Titus, who was sitting next to the...
en


Titus, who was sitting next to the driver, turned back to me.

LineNo: 9985567,

Titus Gordion: We shall be arriving shortly, Your...
en


"We shall be arriving shortly, Your Majesty."

LineNo: 9985685,

Player_Romus: Good. I’ve been looking forward to...
en


"Good. I’ve been looking forward to this for quite some time."

LineNo: 9985787,

Player_Romus: Let’s get this over with.
en


"Let’s get this over with."

LineNo: 9985889,

Player_Romus: This should be interesting.
en


"This should be interesting."

LineNo: 9985997,

Narrator: I was here for the Consecration of...
en


I was here for the Consecration of the King, the centuries-old ecclesiastical ceremony symbolizing a monarch's appointment as God’s highest representative on earth.

LineNo: 9986099,

Narrator: Better known as the “divine right o...
en


Better known as the “divine right of kings.”

LineNo: 9986201,

Narrator: Unlike my coronation, this was a pr...
en


Unlike my coronation, this was a private event shrouded in secrecy.

LineNo: 9986303,

Narrator: Not even my father, despite my aski...
en


Not even my father, despite my asking, would disclose what occurred. He would simply say, “What took place was between me and God.”

LineNo: 9986405,

Narrator: But aside from the pomp and circums...
en


But aside from the pomp and circumstance of the Consecration of the King, this meeting was my chance to catch up on Rizia's current state of religious affairs.

LineNo: 9986507,

Narrator: Before long, my car pulled up in fr...
en


Before long, my car pulled up in front of the towering colonnades situated on either side of the entrance.

LineNo: 9986609,

Player_Romus: Grand Wiseman Ignacius... Looking...
en


"Grand Wiseman Ignacius... Looking as stoic as ever."

LineNo: 9986717,

Player_Romus: Look at the old geezer. Hard to be...
en


"Look at the old geezer. Hard to believe he's still breathing."

LineNo: 9986825,

Player_Romus: Here we go.
en


"Here we go."

LineNo: 9986933,

Narrator: Most cheered my praises, but there...
en


Most cheered my praises, but there was also a small group of demonstrators protesting the ceremony.

LineNo: 9987035,

Narrator: A welcoming smile spread across the...
en


A welcoming smile spread across the Grand Wiseman's face as he came down the stairs to greet me.

LineNo: 9987137,

Sal Ignacius: Welcome, Your Majesty. We are grea...
en


"Welcome, Your Majesty. We are greatly honored to have you here for this momentous occasion."

LineNo: 9987239,

Sal Ignacius: I look forward to serving you as I...
en


"I look forward to serving you as I served your father.”

LineNo: 9987357,

Player_Romus: It is I who is honored to be here.
en


"It is I who is honored to be here."

LineNo: 9987465,

Player_Romus: I shall honor this day with the di...
en


"I shall honor this day with the dignity and respect this sacred tradition deserves."

LineNo: 9987573,

Player_Romus: I could think of better ways to sp...
en


"I could think of better ways to spend my day, but when duty calls, one must oblige."

LineNo: 9987681,

Sal Ignacius: “It fills my heart with joy to hear...
en


“It fills my heart with joy to hear it.”

LineNo: 9987783,

Sal Ignacius: I shall do my best to provide you...
en


"I shall do my best to provide you with both personal and state guidance on religion.”

LineNo: 9987909,

Player_Romus: “Thank you, Grand Wiseman. I aspire...
en


“Thank you, Grand Wiseman. I aspire to fulfill God's will here on earth, just as you have done."

LineNo: 9988017,

Player_Romus: “Time is short, Grand Wiseman. Let...
en


“Time is short, Grand Wiseman. Let us skip the pleasantries."

LineNo: 9988125,

Player_Romus: And I am privileged to receive you...
en


"And I am privileged to receive your guidance.”

LineNo: 9988233,

Player_Romus: Your best? Only the weak whine abo...
en


"Your best? Only the weak whine about doing their best."

LineNo: 9988341,

Sal Ignacius: I'm merely a humble servant, Your...
en


"I'm merely a humble servant, Your Grace. I do as God commands."

LineNo: 9988443,

Sal Ignacius: “The six stars of St. Wruhec still...
en


“The six stars of St. Wruhec still shine upon our nation."

LineNo: 9988545,

Sal Ignacius: “Come, let us step inside. We have...
en


“Come, let us step inside. We have much to discuss.”

LineNo: 9988647,

Narrator: We began heading toward the entranc...
en


We began heading toward the entrance. However, I didn't get very far before my attention was drawn to a commotion from behind.

LineNo: 9988749,

Narrator: As I turned to look, a throng of pe...
en


As I turned to look, a throng of people surged against my security guards.

LineNo: 9988851,

Player_Romus_Italic: I didn't want to be seen as a cowar...
en


I didn't want to be seen as a coward, so I stood my ground as the man approached.

LineNo: 9988857,

Player_Romus_Italic: I didn't want to be seen as a cowar...
Menu Text en


Stand your ground.

LineNo: 9988959,

Player_Romus_Italic: I hurried towards the archsanctuary...
en


I hurried towards the archsanctuary before he could reach me.

LineNo: 9988965,

Player_Romus_Italic: I hurried towards the archsanctuary...
Menu Text en


Hurry towards the archsanctuary.

LineNo: 9989067,

Narrator: Titus, without missing a beat, caug...
en


Titus, without missing a beat, caught the man by the arm and threw him to the ground.

LineNo: 9989169,

Narrator: Other guards approached as Titus he...
en


Other guards approached as Titus held the man down.

LineNo: 9989271,

Player_Romus: What's so blasphemous about it?
en


"What's so blasphemous about it?"

LineNo: 9989379,

Player_Romus: “And so you banned them. Rightly so...
en


“And so you banned them. Rightly so, I might add."

LineNo: 9989487,

Player_Romus: “Could we not have built Golcondist...
en


“Could we not have built Golcondist sanctuaries to pacify them?”

LineNo: 9989595,

Narrator: With a nod from Captain Gordion, tw...
en


With a nod from Captain Gordion, two of his guardsmen lifted the man to his feet and escorted him away.

LineNo: 9989697,

Narrator: Sal and I continued towards the arc...
en


Sal and I continued towards the archsanctuary's entrance.

LineNo: 9989799,

Sal Ignacius: I humbly apologize for the interru...
en


"I humbly apologize for the interruption, Your Majesty."

LineNo: 9989901,

Sal Ignacius: “Shall we proceed?”
en


“Shall we proceed?”

LineNo: 9990027,

Player_Romus: “Lead the way.”
en


“Lead the way.”

LineNo: 9990135,

Player_Romus: “Yes. The sooner we get this over w...
en


“Yes. The sooner we get this over with, the better.”

LineNo: 9990243,

Player_Romus: “How could I say no?
en


“How could I say no?"

LineNo: 9990351,

Player_Romus: Just point me in the right directi...
en


"Just point me in the right direction."

LineNo: 9990453,

Narrator: I accompanied Sal into the archsanc...
en


I accompanied Sal into the archsanctuary. Titus and one of his men stood guard at the entrance.

LineNo: 9990555,

Narrator: Our footsteps echoed throughout the...
en


Our footsteps echoed throughout the massive empty chamber as we made our way down the main aisle, separating the hall in two.

LineNo: 9990657,

Narrator: I was surrounded by ornate wall mur...
en


I was surrounded by ornate wall murals of religious scene depictions, leaving no surface bare. Nearby statues seem to watch me as I passed.

LineNo: 9990783,

Sal Ignacius: “Being the final resting place of C...
en


“Being the final resting place of Caelus the Devout, it’s only fitting that such a monument be built in his honor."

LineNo: 9990885,

Player_Romus: “This place never fails to impress....
en


“This place never fails to impress.”

LineNo: 9990993,

Player_Romus: “I remember the archsanctuary being...
en


“I remember the archsanctuary being a lot bigger.”

LineNo: 9991101,

Player_Romus: “One could get lost in a place like...
en


“One could get lost in a place like this.”

LineNo: 9991209,

Player_Romus: “All spectacle. No sustenance.”
en


“All spectacle. No sustenance.”

LineNo: 9991317,

Sal Ignacius: Some might say, spiritual sustenan...
en


"Some might say, spiritual sustenance comes from within."

LineNo: 9991419,

Sal Ignacius: Credited for single-handedly sprea...
en


"Credited for single-handedly spreading the teachings of St. Wruhec throughout the kingdom, he's considered Rizia’s most revered disciple."

LineNo: 9991537,

Player_Romus: “I’m not here for a history lesson....
en


“I’m not here for a history lesson. Let’s get down to business.”

LineNo: 9991645,

Player_Romus: As a great admirer of his, I've al...
en


"As a great admirer of his, I've always aspired to lead a life of devotion and virtue, much like his own."

LineNo: 9991753,

Sal Ignacius: If you insist.
en


"If you insist."

LineNo: 9991855,

Player_Romus: “Yes, yes. I know all about him. Bu...
en


“Yes, yes. I know all about him. But he’s not the reason why I’m here.”

LineNo: 9991963,

Sal Ignacius: It warms my heart to hear it.
en


"It warms my heart to hear it."

LineNo: 9992065,

Sal Ignacius: Without him, we Rizians would be n...
en


"Without him, we Rizians would be no more enlightened than Dastnurists."

LineNo: 9992167,

Narrator: We stopped when we'd reached the ch...
en


We stopped when we'd reached the chancel where the altar stood.

LineNo: 9992269,

Player_Romus: As long as you are Grand Wiseman,...
en


"As long as you are Grand Wiseman, I am sure that those values will persevere."

LineNo: 9992377,

Player_Romus: The Dastnurists are particularly c...
en


"The Dastnurists are particularly concerning, as they place exclusive reliance on the scripture of St. Dast, disregarding centuries of progress since Descension Day."

LineNo: 9992485,

Player_Romus: The Golcondists pose a particularl...
en


"The Golcondists pose a particularly large threat, using Wruhecism as a cover for blasphemy."

LineNo: 9992593,

Player_Romus: The Wehzeks endured immense suffer...
en


"The Wehzeks endured immense suffering during the civil war, and I wouldn't deny them the right to find solace in their religion."

LineNo: 9992701,

Sal Ignacius: No, certainly not.
en


"No, certainly not."

LineNo: 9992803,

Sal Ignacius: However, he was too preoccupied wi...
en


"However, he was too preoccupied with other matters to sign the order."

LineNo: 9992929,

Player_Romus: “More proof that church and state s...
en


“More proof that church and state should be separate entities."

LineNo: 9993037,

Player_Romus: That's unacceptable; I can't belie...
en


"That's unacceptable; I can't believe I'm only finding out about this now."

LineNo: 9993145,

Player_Romus: Maybe he didn't think that Plavo w...
en


"Maybe he didn't think that Plavo was worth saving.”

LineNo: 9993253,

Sal Ignacius: “I recently received an urgent requ...
en


“I recently received an urgent request from the Archpriest of Sallabes. That city's Dastnurist sanctuary has long been insufficient to serve worshippers' needs, and he requests that a new one be constructed."

LineNo: 9993379,

Player_Romus: I'm not opposed, but isn't that th...
en


"I'm not opposed, but isn't that the purview of the province of Brenas?"

LineNo: 9993487,

Player_Romus: We should give the Dastnurists the...
en


"We should give the Dastnurists their sanctuary, as every inhabitant of Rizia should have a dedicated space for religious practice."

LineNo: 9993595,

Player_Romus: “Can't they worship in the same san...
en


“Can't they worship in the same sanctuaries as Wruhecists?"

LineNo: 9993703,

Player_Romus: We can't just roll out the welcome...
en


"We can't just roll out the welcome mat to Dastnurity without considering where it might lead."

LineNo: 9993811,

Player_Romus: I can tell you right away, I want...
en


"I can tell you right away, I want to restore the Archsanctuary of Plavo."

LineNo: 9993817,

Player_Romus: I can tell you right away, I want...
Menu Text en


"I can tell you right away, I want to restore the Archsanctuary of Plavo." [-2 Budget]

LineNo: 9993919,

Player_Romus: “It's settled. I will speak to Elen...
en


“It's settled. I will speak to Elena about allocating funds for both projects.”

LineNo: 9993925,

Player_Romus: “It's settled. I will speak to Elen...
Menu Text en


"It’s settled. I will speak to Elena about allocating funds for both projects.” [-4 Budget]

LineNo: 9994027,

Player_Romus: I've made my decision. We're build...
en


"I've made my decision. We're building the Sallabes Dastnurist Grand Sanctuary."  [-2 Budget]

LineNo: 9994033,

Player_Romus: I've made my decision. We're build...
Menu Text en


"I've made my decision. We're building the Sallabes Dastnurist Grand Sanctuary."  [-2 Budget]

LineNo: 9994135,

Player_Romus: Thanks for your advice. I'll decid...
en


"Thanks for your advice. I'll decide later."

LineNo: 9994243,

Sal Ignacius: “A most wise decision, Your Majesty...
en


“A most wise decision, Your Majesty. May God’s shining light forever guide you even through the darkest times.”

LineNo: 9994345,

Narrator: The Grand Wiseman's eyes lit up.
en


The Grand Wiseman's eyes lit up.

LineNo: 9994447,

Sal Ignacius: God be praised!
en


"God be praised!"

LineNo: 9994549,

Narrator: The holy man let out a small gasp.
en


The holy man let out a small gasp.

LineNo: 9994651,

Sal Ignacius: “Which brings me to the main reason...
en


“Which brings me to the main reason for your visitation… the Consecration of the King ceremony."

LineNo: 9994753,

Narrator: Sal approached me with a warm and i...
en


Sal approached me with a warm and inviting demeanor.

LineNo: 9994855,

Sal Ignacius: “With great honor, I shall lead you...
en


“With great honor, I shall lead you as you step across the threshold and unite with the divine."

LineNo: 9994957,

Sal Ignacius: “If you’ll follow me, we can begin....
en


“If you’ll follow me, we can begin.”

LineNo: 9995059,

Narrator: He motioned toward a stone archway...
en


He motioned toward a stone archway leading out of the chamber.

LineNo: 9995161,

Narrator: I followed the Grand Wiseman down a...
en


I followed the Grand Wiseman down a long corridor.

LineNo: 9995263,

Sal Ignacius: This way, Your Majesty.
en


"This way, Your Majesty."

LineNo: 9995365,

Narrator: I continued after him as we went do...
en


I continued after him as we went down the stairs, which seemed to go on forever.

LineNo: 9995467,

Narrator: Before long, we'd reached the botto...
en


Before long, we'd reached the bottom, where I was greeted by a wall of human bones that were carefully stacked from top to bottom.

LineNo: 9995569,

Player_Romus: “I had no idea this was down here.”
en


“I had no idea this was down here.”

LineNo: 9995677,

Sal Ignacius: Most don’t.
en


"Most don’t."

LineNo: 9995779,

Sal Ignacius: As for the tomb's tenants, they're...
en


"As for the tomb's tenants, they're mostly wealthy noblemen and their families alongside other well-to-do individuals throughout the centuries."

LineNo: 9995889,

Sal Ignacius: This way, Your Grace.
en


"This way, Your Grace."

LineNo: 9995991,

Narrator: As we made our way down the tunnel,...
en


As we made our way down the tunnel, the ceiling began to close in around us, and feelings of claustrophobia began to sink in.

LineNo: 9996093,

Narrator: Just when it seemed like the tunnel...
en


Just when it seemed like the tunnel would never end, we emerged into a vast cavern, also illuminated by torchlight. Several wiscerers, lesser in rank than Sal, were waiting for us.

LineNo: 9996195,

Narrator: They were arranged around a marble...
en


They were arranged around a marble sarcophagus.

LineNo: 9996321,

Player_Romus: “Is that who I think it is?
en


“Is that who I think it is?"

LineNo: 9996429,

Sal Ignacius: Rare are those who have set foot h...
en


"Rare are those who have set foot here. Count yourself among the blessed few."

LineNo: 9996531,

Narrator: Caelus the Devout's effigy became m...
en


Caelus the Devout's effigy became more apparent as I approached.

LineNo: 9996633,

Narrator: Sal placed his torch into a nearby...
en


Sal placed his torch into a nearby sconce as one of the other wisemen, carrying a silver tray, approached us.

LineNo: 9996735,

Narrator: On it was a golden chalice, a clay...
en


On it was a golden chalice, a clay jug filled with oil, a sponge, and what appeared to be a bottle of wine.

LineNo: 9996837,

Sal Ignacius: “Let us begin. Please remove your c...
en


“Let us begin. Please remove your clothes and stand on the royal seal.”

LineNo: 9996963,

Player_Romus: “I am ready.”
en


“I am ready.”

LineNo: 9997071,

Player_Romus: Whatever you say.
en


"Whatever you say."

LineNo: 9997179,

Player_Romus: “Actually... I'm beginning to have...
en


“Actually... I'm beginning to have second thoughts."

LineNo: 9997287,

Narrator: Following the Grand Wiseman's instr...
en


Following the Grand Wiseman's instructions, I joined him in reciting verses from the sacred scripture.

LineNo: 9997389,

Narrator: When my garments were completely re...
en


When my garments were completely removed, Sal proceeded to anoint me, dipping a sponge into the fragrant oil and gently applying it all over my body.

LineNo: 9997491,

Narrator: He then poured the wine into the ch...
en


He then poured the wine into the chalice until it reached the brim.

LineNo: 9997593,

Sal Ignacius: “It is well known that this is the...
en


“It is well known that this is the final resting place of Caelus the Devout."

LineNo: 9997695,

Sal Ignacius: But what most don’t know is that t...
en


"But what most don’t know is that this is where he performed his first miracle.”

LineNo: 9997821,

Player_Romus: “Miracle? Did I hear you correctly?...
en


“Miracle? Did I hear you correctly?”

LineNo: 9997929,

Player_Romus: “I’ve never heard of disciples perf...
en


“I’ve never heard of disciples performing miracles before.”

LineNo: 9998037,

Player_Romus: “This is news to me.”
en


“This is news to me.”

LineNo: 9998145,

Player_Romus: “You’re joking, right.”
en


“You’re joking, right.”

LineNo: 9998253,

Sal Ignacius: “Yes. The miracle of foresight.
en


“Yes. The miracle of foresight."

LineNo: 9998355,

Sal Ignacius: For upon filling his stomach with...
en


"For upon filling his stomach with the sacred wine -- the very wine before you now -- he was given ability to prophesize the future."

LineNo: 9998457,

Player_Romus: What can I expect to see?
en


"What can I expect to see?"

LineNo: 9998565,

Narrator: He poured the wine into the chalice...
en


He poured the wine into the chalice, and held it high.

LineNo: 9998683,

Sal Ignacius: You will see nothing. Only the mos...
en


"You will see nothing. Only the most pious and reverent of men may drink from the sacred chalice."

LineNo: 9998785,

Sal Ignacius: For you see, once consumed, Caelus...
en


"For you see, once consumed, Caelus the Devout's gift of foresight shall, for a time, be bestowed upon the person who ingests it."

LineNo: 9998887,

Narrator: He held up the chalice once more an...
en


He held up the chalice once more and drank until the wine was gone.

LineNo: 9998989,

Narrator: Setting it back down on the tray, h...
en


Setting it back down on the tray, he then stepped toward me and held out his hands.

LineNo: 9999107,

Narrator: We stood there in silence for what...
en


We stood there in silence for what felt like an eternity. I wasn't sure what to expect.

LineNo: 9999209,

Narrator: But then suddenly, his body began t...
en


But then suddenly, his body began to tremble and his hands took a firm grip in mine.

LineNo: 9999311,

Sal Ignacius: Listen closely to my words. For th...
en


"Listen closely to my words. For the gift of sight comes in flashes."

LineNo: 9999413,

Player_Romus_Italic: I closed my eyes as well.
en


I closed my eyes as well.

LineNo: 9999419,

Player_Romus_Italic: I closed my eyes as well.
Menu Text en


Close your eyes.

LineNo: 9999521,

Player_Romus_Italic: I kept my eyes open, waiting to see...
en


I kept my eyes open, waiting to see what would happen next.

LineNo: 9999527,

Player_Romus_Italic: I kept my eyes open, waiting to see...
Menu Text en


Leave eyes open.

LineNo: 9999629,

Player_Romus_Italic: Scanning the room, I watched as the...
en


Scanning the room, I watched as the other priests looked on, waiting to see what would happen next.

LineNo: 9999635,

Player_Romus_Italic: Scanning the room, I watched as the...
Menu Text en


Look around you.

LineNo: 9999737,

Player_Romus_Italic: I placed my hands in his.
en


I placed my hands in his.

LineNo: 9999743,

Player_Romus_Italic: I placed my hands in his.
Menu Text en


Take his hands.

LineNo: 9999845,

Player_Romus_Italic: I took a step back.
en


I took a step back.

LineNo: 9999851,

Player_Romus_Italic: I took a step back.
Menu Text en


Step back.

LineNo: 9999969,

Player_Romus_Italic: I pulled my hands away from him.
en


I pulled my hands away from him.

LineNo: 9999975,

Player_Romus_Italic: I pulled my hands away from him.
Menu Text en


Retract your hands.

LineNo: 10000093,

Sal Ignacius: To consummate the Consecration of...
en


"To consummate the Consecration of the King I must insist that you take my hands."

LineNo: 10000219,

Player_Romus: Very well, then.
en


"Very well, then."

LineNo: 10000327,

Player_Romus: Nobody told me there would be prop...
en


"Nobody told me there would be prophecies. I cannot rule with the weight of future events hanging over my head."

LineNo: 10000435,

Player_Romus: And *I* must insist that you remem...
en


"And *I* must insist that you remember who you're speaking to!"

LineNo: 10000543,

Sal Ignacius: Interrupting the ritual will have...
en


"Interrupting the ritual will have long-lasting consequences. I must insist that you take my hand, or else I cannot bestow my consent on the ceremony's completion."

LineNo: 10000669,

Narrator: I quickly put on my clothes, and ma...
en


I quickly put on my clothes, and made my way back through the catacombs until I'd reached the surface.

LineNo: 10000771,

Narrator: Titus and another guardsman were at...
en


Titus and another guardsman were at my side the moment they saw me re-emerge.

LineNo: 10000873,

Titus Gordion: Your Majesty, is everything alrigh...
en


"Your Majesty, is everything alright?"

LineNo: 10000999,

Player_Romus: That's none of your concern. We're...
en


"That's none of your concern. We're leaving."

LineNo: 10001107,

Player_Romus: Yes. We just have to go.
en


"Yes. We just have to go."

LineNo: 10001215,

Player_Romus_Italic: I barreled past him without saying...
en


I barreled past him without saying a word.

LineNo: 10001221,

Player_Romus_Italic: I barreled past him without saying...
Menu Text en


Ignore him.

LineNo: 10001323,

Player_Romus: Get out of my way, Captain. Do you...
en


"Get out of my way, Captain. Do you want to be demoted to private?"

LineNo: 10001431,

Narrator: I thought about the Grand Wiseman's...
en


I thought about the Grand Wiseman's last words to me as the Archsanctuary of Plavo faded from view.

LineNo: 10001533,

Narrator: Before long, my motorcade was back...
en


Before long, my motorcade was back on the road.

LineNo: 10001635,

Narrator: By the time I'd made it back to the...
en


By the time I'd made it back to the car, the captain was so far behind, I ended up opening the door myself.

LineNo: 10001737,

Narrator: I barely noticed when the motorcade...
en


I barely noticed when the motorcade pulled out of the city and back onto the highway.

LineNo: 10001839,

Narrator: I couldn't let go even if I wanted.
en


I couldn't let go even if I wanted.

LineNo: 10001941,

Narrator: My outburst left the wiseman speech...
en


My outburst left the wiseman speechless. Seemly shocked, he bowed his head and backed away.

LineNo: 10002043,

Narrator: At his advanced age, he wasn't exac...
en


At his advanced age, he wasn't exactly spry.

LineNo: 10002145,

Sal Ignacius: Are you alright, Your Majesty?
en


"Are you alright, Your Majesty?"

LineNo: 10002271,

Player_Romus: I should be the one asking you.
en


"I should be the one asking you."

LineNo: 10002379,

Player_Romus: That's none of your concern.
